HANDCRAFTED PAPIER-MACHE TURTLE.

A treat for the animal lovers, handcrafted is a Papier-Mache TURTLE that will bring animated charm to your living space. Let this classic and exclusive piece of decor spread colour and warmth within your home.You can also store your precious little things in this turtle that turn into box.

Material:
    Mashed Paper (Wood) and Papier-Mache.
Care:
    Dust it with a soft cotton cloth to keep away the dirt.
Usage:
    Unique gift Item, Exclusive piece of decor and storage box.
Shipping Info:
    Dispatched in a maximum of 6 business days

PAPIER-MACHE BANGLE
